de.modlab.smilib.iterator
Class CombinationScheme

java.lang.Object
  de.modlab.smilib.iterator.CombinationScheme

public class CombinationScheme
extends java.lang.Object

Administrates information which Linkers/BuildingBlocks shall be used on the variable side chains.

Constructor Summary
CombinationScheme(int scaffoldNumber, int numRGroups)
          Creates a new instance of CombinationScheme
 
Method Summary
 void addBBlocks(java.lang.Integer[] block)
          The building blocks specified in a column of the reaction scheme are set as the building blocks to be used on the rGroup corresponding to that column.
 void addLinkers(java.lang.Integer[] linker)
          The linkers specified in a column of the reaction scheme are set as the linkers to be used on the rGroup corresponding to that column.

          Returns, which building blocks shall be used on which rGroups

Constructor Detail

CombinationScheme

public CombinationScheme(int scaffoldNumber,
                         int numRGroups)
Creates a new instance of CombinationScheme

Parameters:
scaffoldNumber - index of scaffold in source file corrected to counting from zero
numRGroups - number of variable side chains
Method Detail

addBBlocks

public void addBBlocks(java.lang.Integer[] block)
The building blocks specified in a column of the reaction scheme are set as the building blocks to be used on the rGroup corresponding to that column.

Parameters:
block - Indices (line numbers in source file) of the building blocks to be used on that rGroup

addLinkers

public void addLinkers(java.lang.Integer[] linker)
The linkers specified in a column of the reaction scheme are set as the linkers to be used on the rGroup corresponding to that column.

Parameters:
linker - Indices (line numbers in source file) of the linkers to be used on that rGroup

getLinkers

public int[][] getLinkers()
Returns, which linkers shall be used on which rGroups

Returns:
array of arrays that contain the indices of the linkers that shall be used on the scaffold-rGroups

getBBlocks

public int[][] getBBlocks()
Returns, which building blocks shall be used on which rGroups

Returns:
array of arrays that contain the indices of the building blocks that shall be used on the scaffold-rGroups

getScaffoldIndex

public int getScaffoldIndex()
Returns Index of the scaffold

Returns:
index of scaffold
